item.title: Paula Abdul leaves American Idol
item.description: Paula Abdul has officially confirmed that she won’t be returning to American Idol this season. "With sadness in my heart, I’ve decided not to return to Idol," she wrote on her Twitter page.

item.title: Criminal Minds star Moore hit by car
item.description: Shemar Moore, 39, who plays FBI Agent Derek Morgan in the CBS drama Criminal Minds, was hit by a car while bicycling in Los Angeles last Saturday.

item.title: Madonna writes love song for ex-husband
item.description: Madonna has sparked speculation that she wants to get back with her ex-husband, Guy Ritchie, after writing a love song for him in which she calls him her "eternal love".
